title.narrative: Oncho LF Guinea Bissau

description.narrative: ​The project aims to reduce the health burden of Oncho (river blindness), lymphatic filariasis , Schistosomiasis and Soil Transmitted Helminthiasis (STH) in Guinea Bissau.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

provider-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office
UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office
